docs.lead_paragraph: THE increase of mankind has been so rapid, so overwhelming and utterly unprecedented in recent years that it is commonly referred to by scientists as a population explosion.

headline.main: Analysis of the Population Explosion; The rapid multiplication of humans is one of man's gravest problems. It is especially acute in underdeveloped lands, where it offsets efforts to raise living standards. The Population Explosion

docs.abstract: K Davis article sees world-wide population 'explosion' hobbling efforts to raise living standards in underdeveloped areas; illus
docs.snippet: THE increase of mankind has been so rapid, so overwhelming and  utterly unprecedented in recent years that it is commonly referred to by scientists as a population explosion.
